# La Garda - Italienisches Restaurant & Pizzeria in Ahlen

## About
La Garda is an authentic Italian restaurant and pizzeria located in Ahlen, Germany. We specialize in traditional Italian cuisine, offering fresh ingredients, genuine Italian recipes, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. Our restaurant serves both dine-in guests and provides delivery service through Pizza Taxi.
